references.formattedCitation: Lancaster, Jerrad, University of London, and Royal Holloway. “Syracusan Settlement Expansion in South-Eastern Sicily in the Archaic Period.” Ph.D. Dissertation, Royal Holloway, 2017. https://pure.royalholloway.ac.uk/portal/en/publications/syracusan-settlement-expansion-in-southeastern-sicily-in-the-archaic-period(d3c36979-6d18-48ac-9b4b-c29587f92732).html.

description: An ancient settlement of Sicily that was likely a colonial foundation of Syracuse.
